description: A coded concept defining the characteristic types of a medication.
name: MedicationCharacteristic

text.div:
MedicationCharacteristic

A coded concept defining the characteristic types of a medication.

This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/medicationKnowledge-character defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
imprintcd Imprint CodeIdentyifying marks on product.
size SizeDescription of size of the product.
shape ShapeDescription of shape of the product.
color ColorDescription of color of the product.
coating CoatingDescription of coating of the product.
scoring ScoringDescription of scoring of the product.
logo LogoDescription of logo of the product.

title: MedicationCharacteristic
